title: Who are musicians that still record music in studio nowadays? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most any music that you hear is recorded in a studio. Although many novice musicians can easily record at home, any professional track will be recorded in a studio. Things like proper acoustics, sound proof room for recording, down to the ballast in the lights getting moved to a different location.

Most if not all musicians in the 21st century have a recording rig at home for hashing out ideas and will only go to a proper studio to give their work that final “polish”. The cost of equipment at professional studios is simply way out of many project studio’s reach. SSL mixing consoles cost as much as a small house.
